Close the loop. Extrusion: Extrude the sketch along the normal with a depth of 0.0577 and an opposite normal depth of 0.0. Apply a sketch scale of 0.75, and then perform a "New Body Feature Operation". Part 2: Construct four holes along the length of the rectangular prism. Create a new coordinate system with the Euler angles set to [0.0, 0.0, 0.0], and the translation vector set to [0.0307, 0.0173, 0.0]. Sketch: Create four new sketches, one on each face.
